name: Lucky Airways vs Flying Bird, Chicken, Fish and Pig
name_original: Lucky Airways vs Flying Bird, Chicken, Fish and Pig
description:
Go Crazy! Fly with Lucky Airways today!

The most fun game ever made by chickens. Challenge your friends and see how far can you fly this plane without being caught by bird, chicken fish or pig.

This is a must have game for everyone.

"Love this game, I can play forever" - J.K.

"Crazy stuff, I love it!" - Turan Kongo

"Life was so boring till I played this!" - Mata Meli

So what are you waiting for? It's FREE!
